quotes: He has also served as UNICEF Ambassador for Thailand since 1996.
In 2003, he was appointed by the UN Secretary General Kofi Annan to chair the UN High-Level Panel on Threats, Challenges and Change
The Panel submitted its report to the Secretary General in December 2004.
He was appointed by Prime Minister Thaksin in 2005-2006 to be Chairman of the National Reconciliation Commission (NRC) on the three southernmost provinces.
Prime Minister Abhisit also appointed him to chair the Reform Commission in 2010-2011.
He has been Chairman of Siam Commercial Bank since September 2007
He is recipient of the prestigious Ramon Magsaysay Award for Government Service in 1997.
Anand was in 2001 elected Chairman of the National Economic and Social Advisory Council.
